mapper.select: select c.create_time,a.*,u.nick_name as username,u.avatar as userAvatar, b.NAME AS categoryName, b.id AS categoryId from blog_article a left join blog_article_collect c on c.article_id = a.id left JOIN blog_category b ON a.category_id = b.id left join `cxblog-cloud`.sys_user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.create_time desc
